project.component:
{:repl-history {:ide [], :local ["(deftest is-image
 (testing "Gifs" (is-image "gif")))" "(-main)" "(is-img "jpg")" "(is-img "jpge")" "(is-img "gif")" "(defn is-img
 "Check if the extension of the file matches that of an image"
 [ext]
 (not= -1 (.indexOf ["jpg" "jpeg" "png" "gif"] ext)))" "(defn -main
 "Main application"
 [& args]
 (let [watermark-path (.getAbsolutePath watermark-file)
 watermark-x-y (identify-width-and-height watermark-file)
 image-list (list-images-from-folder unprocessed-folder)
 images (map #(let [image-path (first %)
 x (second %)
 y (nth % 2)
 width (/ x 2)
 height (/ y 2)
 left (- x (/ width 1.5))
 top -75]
 [watermark-path image-path width height left top]) image-list)]
 (doall (map #(apply composite-watermark %) images)))
 (shutdown-agents))"], :remote []}}
